subject: Rugby (Game)
lead_paragraph: Carlin Isles, who was ranked in the top 40 in the United States in the 100 meters, has become the talk of his new sport, rugby sevens, for his ability to outrun opponents.
snippet: Carlin Isles, who was ranked in the top 40 in the United States in the 100 meters, has become the talk of his new sport, rugby sevens, for his ability to outrun opponents.
